headline: Why The Narrative Around Informa (LSE:INF) Is Shifting After New Analyst Updates
summary: Informa's updated fair value estimate has shifted only marginally, with a slightly higher price target reflecting small tweaks to revenue and discount rate assumptions rather than a change in the overall view of the business. Analysts remain split between more upbeat Overweight calls and a Neutral stance, and that tension is keeping most price targets clustered within a fairly tight band. Continue with this article to see how you can keep on top of these incremental narrative shifts before...
